item.description:
WHAT? You've never been to Katama's grass strip on Martha's Vineyard? C'mon, grab your goggles, white scarf and favorite Stearman and let's fly down to the Right Fork Diner for some chow.

1B2 Katama Airfield

http://www.airnav.com/airport/1B2

 

 

This is the largest grass strip in the US. Stay for the day if you want. Parking fee is $5.00 for the day and you taxi up to the street, grab your towel and beach chair and walk across the street to the famous South Beach. Amazing!

 

See ya then,

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Katama visit, breakfast and the beach :-) yaaaaaa
